definitions.definition: To cut meat in order to serve it.
definitions.example: You carve the roast and I'll serve the vegetables.

definitions.definition: To shape to sculptural effect; to produce (a work) by cutting, or to cut (a material) into a finished work.
definitions.example: to carve a name into a tree

definitions.definition: To perform a series of turns without pivoting, so that the tip and tail of the snowboard take the same path.
To take or make, as by cutting; to provide.
To lay out; to contrive; to design; to plan.

definitions.example: The carvings on the oak panels were ancient.

definitions.definition: The act or craft of producing a carved object.
definitions.example: He took up carving after his retirement.
